p.b: UPDATE: The server issues appear to have been resolved. Thanks for your patience.

body.p: As some of you may have noticed, earlier on today we experienced problems with our website, most of the content is now back up in it's temporary location. Please bear with us whilst we try and resume normal service.
90% of the links are working again, the remaining issues are the ones starting with /dyn/
Thank you for your patience -- The Gentoo.org admin team
